results.title: Spectacle Director Showcase: Leo Baker
results.creator_credit: ACMI, Kim Montgomery and Shelley Matulick
results.brief_description: Celebrated animator Leo Baker discusses working with Australian band ‘Children Collide’ to create a hybrid live-action and animation video for their song ‘Praying for Sunshine’. Aside from making music videos, Baker was also one of the lead animators on the Oscar-winning screen adaptation of Shaun Tan’s acclaimed ‘The Lost Thing’.

results.title: Special trade
results.brief_description: A story about a friendship between a young girl and her grandfather. As a baby, the young girl was taken for outings and taught to walk by her grandfather. Then, one day he returns home from the hospital in a wheelchair and it is the young girl’s turn to take her grandfather for walks. Based on the book entitled “Special Trade” by Sally Whitman.

results.title: Special Role of Teacher, Multi-Cultural Soc.(Keynote)(TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Special Role of the Teacher in the Multicultural Society”.
‘The special role of the teacher in a multi-cultural society’ : a conference at S.C.V.Rushden (Keynote address). Keynote address by Lorna Lippman, Director of Community Relations Bureau. Introduction by D.D.Taylor, Dean. Welcoming address by Dr. P.J.Wisch, Principal.

results.title: Special Effects
results.brief_description: This thoroughly entertaining program takes the viewer on a behind the scenes look at such special effects blockbusters as “Blade Runner”, “The Right Stuff”, “The Empire Strikes Back” and “Return of the Jedi” along with examples of the latest work being done in computer generated imagery, video games and sound effects. Narrated by Robin King.

Narrated by Robin King.

results.title: Special effects
results.brief_description: Provides an intriguing look at certain special effects employed by Oxford Scientific Films mainly in their biological and scientific productions. Also shows the scientific effects generated for some science fiction films. Highlights the need to plan and set up shots well.

results.title: Special delivery
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Derek Lamb, John Weldon and Eunice Macaulay
results.brief_description: Special Delivery looks like a detective story and sounds like a soap opera. A series of misadventures stretches the imagination to its limits, as Alice and Ralph Phelps battle with the snow and the dead mailman. A comic moral tale which warns of the perils of the slippery slope! Winner of the 1979 Academy Award for Best Animated Short.
